author: [Anonymous]
text: Does/can ICMA offer relocation assistance for its members?  With an average tenure of around five years, we are constantly moving around the country and buying/selling homes.  Now that the housing market is virtually non-existent, many of us have been left holding an unbelievable amount of mortgage debt not being able to sell our homes.  Many of our counterparts in the private sector are offered relocation assistance through their employers.  I would like ICMA to offer this service, and to have my city pay for this as part of my contract.  Is this possible?  What are your thoughts?
title: City Manager Relocation Assistance
